tool_description: Resizes images to specified dimensions while maintaining aspect ratio and optimizing for different display contexts.

asset_id.description: Asset identifier of the image to resize

preset.description: Predefined size preset: thumbnail, small, medium, large, or hero

maintain_aspect_ratio.description: Whether to preserve original aspect ratio

error_messages: Asset not found: The specified asset_id does not exist.
Invalid dimensions: Either specify width/height or use a preset from [thumbnail, small, medium, large, hero].
Dimension out of range: width and height must be positive integers less than 10000.
Resize failed: Image could not be resized - check source image format and integrity.
usage: Provide asset ID and either specific dimensions (width/height) or use a preset. Enable maintain_aspect_ratio to prevent distortion.

resized_asset_id.description: New asset ID for the resized image

original_width.description: Width of original image in pixels

original_height.description: Height of original image in pixels

new_width.description: Width of resized image in pixels

new_height.description: Height of resized image in pixels
